body:
I've experienced some hanging of the IDE lately and I think it's because of the reformatting on save.
this are my dumps:
[dump.zip](https://github.com/flutter/flutter-intellij/files/2052048/dump.zip)

comment_data.body:
Thanks for the report! This exception looks related:

Likely related:

```
there's a deadlock on format on save, due to analysis server calls on a write action
- re-work to call the server first, then apply the response in a write action
- canâ€™t use file offsets manager when under a write action
```

Yes, that's the deadlock we discussed at the meeting. The relevant stack is inside auto-saved thread dumps in the attached zip:
```
"AWT-EventQueue-0 2018.1.4#IU-181.5087.20 IDEA, eap:false, os:Mac OS X 10.13.4, java-version:JetBrains s.r.o 1.8.0_152-release-1136-b39" prio=0 tid=0x0 nid=0x0 blocked
```

title: Reformat on save leads to deadlock
